statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, category FROM inventory_reports WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE movement_speed = 'Fast' AND price < 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_reports WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, movement_speed FROM inventory_reports WHERE movement_speed LIKE '%Slow%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_reports WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, category, quantity, price, movement_speed FROM inventory_reports WHERE movement_speed = 'Fast' AND category LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory_reports WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE price >= 500.00 AND (category = 'Clothing' OR category = 'Accessories') ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, price FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_sold_date FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY last_sold_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotion_targets WHERE target_discount > 0.5;
SELECT product_name, target_type, target_discount FROM promotion_targets WHERE target_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_sold_date DESC, price ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, price FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND price > 50;
SELECT target_id, product_name, target_discount FROM promotion_targets WHERE target_type = 'Seasonal' ORDER BY target_discount DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM slow_moving_inventory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM slow_moving_inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(price) > 100;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT name, quantity FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity, last_updated FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_id, clearance_price FROM clearance ORDER BY clearance_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity, DATE(last_updated) AS updated_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' AND quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT clearance_id, product_id, clearance_price, reason FROM clearance WHERE clearance_price < 100 ORDER BY clearance_price ASC;

SELECT promotions.promotion_id, promotions.product_id, clearance.clearance_price, promotions.start_date, promotions.end_date, promotions.discount FROM promotions INNER JOIN clearance ON promotions.product_id = clearance.product_id;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity <= 10 AND last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date AS expiry_date FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_id, product_id, discount_percentage FROM promotion_targets WHERE discount_percentage > 0.2;
SELECT clearance_id, product_id, clearance_price, clearance_reason FROM clearance_targets WHERE clearance_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT clearance_price, product_id FROM clearance_targets WHERE clearance_price > 1000 ORDER BY clearance_price DESC;
SELECT promotion_id, discount_percentage FROM promotion_targets WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_date, status FROM report_logs WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, last_sold_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE last_sold_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_sold_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount >= 0.2 ORDER BY promotion_name;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_sold_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND unit_price < 100 ORDER BY last_sold_date ASC
SELECT product_name, unit_price, last_sold_date FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 20 AND unit_price > 200 ORDER BY unit_price DESC, last_sold_date ASC
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date, generated_by, notes FROM inventory_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
